LanguageData.RimPlas.label: RimPlas
LanguageData.RimPlas.description: Grants the ability to use new materials.
LanguageData.RimPlas_AdvComponents.label: Construct RimPlas Advanced Components
LanguageData.RimPlas_AdvComponents.description: Grants the ability to make Rimplas versions of advanced components.
LanguageData.RimPlas_AdvInjMld.label: Advanced Injection Moulding
LanguageData.RimPlas_AdvInjMld.description: Grants the ability to make complex materials with injection moulding.
LanguageData.RimPlas_Components.label: Construct RimPlas Components
LanguageData.RimPlas_Components.description: Grants the ability to make Rimplas versions of components.
LanguageData.RimPlas_InjMld.label: Injection Moulding
LanguageData.RimPlas_InjMld.description: Grants the ability to make furniture using injection moulding.
LanguageData.RimPlas_MultiAnalyzer.label: Construct RimPlas MultiAnalyzer
LanguageData.RimPlas_MultiAnalyzer.description: Grants the ability to make a Rimplas version of the multianalyzer.
